message.body: Wrong library. Oops. Happy studies
D'oh! You too
Can you definitely bring OJ?
Yep
Cool. 1:30 tomorrow I want to start setting up
I won't be done with class until two
Cool neither will lija
Just come when you can :)
Do you have a wine opener?
Our next art masterpiece should be a dinosaur collage for Kim's son!!!
Dinosaurs are birds!!!
You're right!!!!
It's funny you texted me (and so early) because I awoke wanting to ask you if you thought owls tasted like chicken.
It seems almost blasphemous to think that
It does seem blasphemous! My old apartment had an owl in the freezer with a do not eat sign on it. Right next to the placenta
Hahahahaha what?!
Oh I found someone with a wine bottle opener
A lot of hippies lived there.
Well, yes. With the placenta I assumed as much!
How was your ok Cupid?
I cancelled to study
He sent me this last night: Im glad your taking school really seriously. Good luck studying. Keep up that effort all the way through. You're gonna do great!
Haha
Haha, he can do his part by coming over and pulling your hair for a bit whenever u need it
Amen
See you all soon at the field next to Goodhart! (not on the campus side, rather the side by the presidents house!)
Whereupon are you?
Are you alright?
Hey, sorry I left my phone charger at Nates but didn't know. I was going crazy being out of touch! I'm sorry I missed the birthday jam, I had no idea where you cats were
Would you want to go on a holistic health "field trip" to the city for yoga, community acupuncture and a healthy dinner if I arranged it and got us funding?
Ok cool :)
Of course, silly
Did anyone else have an egg roll today? Did you notice it there was shellfish? I think I'm having an allergic reaction but im not sure...it's different every time
Fuck
Are u ok?
Ya I'm definitely having an allergic reaction
And have been for a couple of days...I think there may have been shellfish in them the past couple times
Apparently I need to avoid the ironically named zen bar
How was orchestra practice??
Ok. Allergic reaction filled!
Otherwise nice :)
Hahahaha right?
At least you weren't playing a wind instrument!
Where u at?
Archaeology!
Yay!!
It would be even cooler if I was stoned and smoking weed
I mean, stoned and giggling about science. I'm drunk and only got 3 hours of sleep last night
No...I still meant the first text
Yeah!
Only three hours because of hot date?
Or because school has turned us into über nerds?
Yea...the latter. Über nerds
We were making signs and stuff for the club. As well as raiding the free bins in every dorm. There was no weed but there was wine
Ha well if you want to call hanging out with Lija and her pup all night a hot date then yes
Nice, did you get any free stuff??
Yoga pants, some great white pants...you need to stick around late some day for the next raid!
Hahahaha
Or my one card?
I was too!!! It was a dream come true
Aw man, I am dying for a good pair or white pants
*of
Yes!! I want the gov to pay for it
I mean, I guess they will anyways
In the dream you are living!
Except they weren't skinny jeans as I had imagined in my dreams. But otherwise awesome
Hahahaha I am living some bizarro awesome dream
I just have to work 'wet' into here somehow and were solid
*we're
Though I saw Meredith today! I now know that she is on the art club board....formulating master plan
Wait who is Meredith?
I mean how do you know her? She is the one that emailed me about arnecliffe
Really? I had dinner with her and her friends (I met her bio major friend one of the orientation things) last week
And I've been crushing on her all week
Tell me more! I want to know everything about her!
She's working yards away from me right now, at a restaurant behind the fire station
I only know this because she told me. Even though that last series of 4 texts started innocently enough I still ended up sounding like a total stalker by the end of it. Damnit.
Haha!! I am such a stalker. Where does she work? We should go in for drinks some night!!!
Oh no, we hAve to find another means of stalking...
I know!!! She's only there for another week or so
Some of the C3s are taking a trip into Philly to explore and eventually get done handy nasty, Er, rather Han dynasty!
They wanted me to spread the word/invitation :)
Want to hang out Monday night? Go to gym/pool?
I know! But at like eight right? I mean earlier, and then gay night!
It's gay night!
Lol
What about in the morning?
If I'm staying for gay night, I can't come to campus any earlier than my 11 am class
Ok
Some sort of gay day swimming sounds nice.
What is the agenda for gay day? Are there activities all day?
Great idea!!!
I don't think so, each dorm has a gay tea. The "sexuality"
Haha cool
I forgot I have lab tomorrow :( and tons of homework
Shit, I have fifty more pages to read and a reflection to write by Tuesday
What up?
Lost in Uruk, what about u?
Lol sleep
That sounds amazing! I remember sleep
